{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Z-Com |model=XI-1500 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/21/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=M4Y-0325H |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510B |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=0.5 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=39VF400A-70-4C-EK |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=2 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16100A1-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XI-325HP |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-MMCX,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9161E |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=My Network |default_ssid_regex=^My Network$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:60:B3 |oui_eth=00:60:B3 |default_ch= }} ''WLAN Inter-Building AP''
'''XI-1450''' is the model on the label on the back of the board.
The power adapter included with the device appears to be a unbranded SP48-121000 (12V, 1A).
